attributes.action: Make universal circumcision for infant boys compulsory and refunded by the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As researchers from Britain and other countries have undisputably proven beyond reasonable doubt, circumcision is beneficial (health-wise) and prevents masturbation. To ensure that our populace is healthy, please make male circumcision universal. HOWEVER, female circumcision (which is a different issue) should not be unbannned. Female circumcision is illegal - as it should be.
